version_description:
- Add a Extreme six kinds of tracks(opening ought to be clear once the last track again.)
- Additional EXTREME BONUS
- Change to a new advertising platform Rewards
- A class three kinds of new vehicle, S Class 1 kinds of added (is selected as the first vehicle has been changed after the update.)
- minor BUG FIX
- Improved driving performance

- Add Extreme tracks (Must clear the winter ex track one more time)
- minor BUG FIX

- iPhone X compatible
- Add Achievements
- Fixed issue where background music plays when a reward ad appears.
- Fixed an issue where advertisements appeared after replay.
- add ad to google mobile ads.
- Bug Fix

Added online mode.
  -Try running with other people. You can run more fun.

Performance improvement
-Changed the effect.
-Dispose of the old rendering method and use new rendering to express light more realistically.

1.3.1
Online mode
-Other users move more naturally.
-Show your ranking on the results screen.

1.3.0
Added online mode.
-Try running with other people. You can run more fun.

Performance improvement
-Changed the effect.
-Dispose of the old rendering method and use new rendering to express light more realistically.

Added online mode.
-Try running with other people. You can run more fun.
-Show your ranking on the results screen.

Bug Fix
- Fixed crash when ending the last track (1.3.4)

Performance improvement
-Changed the effect.
-Dispose of the old rendering method and use new rendering to express light more realistically.
